references: We follow the HFL framework in

while further incorporating the mobility of vehicles. We call the stochastic gradient descent (SGD) process on a batch of samples at each vehicle as a local update. We maintain an iteration enumerator
, which records the number of local updates each vehicle has carried out in total. A synchronized system is considered, so
is tracked by all the vehicles. We denote the models of the

The training procedure is illustrated in Fig.

. We assume that vehicles sample data before training in the preparation stage, and the dataset carried by each vehicle does not vary during training. After sampling, all the cloud and edge servers initialize with a global model
. The training stage is consist of the following four steps:
: Let each edge server maintain a covering vehicle set

, and assume that each vehicle is associated with the nearest edge server only.
